Name: Unit of Resolution
Description: A unit of Resolution is a measure of the rate of the number of dots (pixesl) in relation to an area.

Properties.Name: Abbreviations
Properties.Description: Abbreviated text representations for this unit

Properties.Name: Canonical abbreviation
Properties.Description: Globally recognised abbreviated text representation for this unit.

Properties.Name: Measurement System
Properties.Description: The measurement system this unit belongs to

Properties.Name: Measured dimension
Properties.Description: The dimension measured by this unit

Properties.Name: Convertion formula
Properties.Description: Convertion formula to the System International base unit
